text:
@Alyssa_Milano While the grossly irresponsible POTUS and Chief of Staff call the coronavirus the Democrat's latest hoax to take down trump, this smug political hack refuses to dispel that lie in order to keep Americans safe. Burn down the Republicans party in November. 
#VoteBlueNoMatterWho🌊

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
